ComicInfo.Summary: MAD puts its special powers to bad use with a peak behind the scenes of The Incredibles, and makes another hero look less-than-super with international editions of Spider-Man. MAD also carjacks Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, objects to Britney Spears' wedding and finds America's Next Top Model strictly from hunger.
